1693.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|103|101$يَـٰٓأَبَانَا|"O our father!|111|140|8840$ٱسْتَغْفِرْ|Ask forgiveness|123|152|7779$لَنَا|for us|58|87|338$ذُنُوبَنَآ|(of) our sins.|106|135|2690$إِنَّا|Indeed, we|94|108|120$كُنَّا|have been|89|334|4361$خَـٰطِــِٔينَ|sinners."|95|340|9269$

1694.verse: قَالَ|He said,|73|80|309$سَوْفَ|"Soon|76|90|4083$أَسْتَغْفِرُ|I will ask forgiveness|157|171|9270$لَكُمْ|for you|67|81|207$رَبِّىٓ‌ۖ|(from) my Lord.|123|137|2902$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He,|97|111|396$هُوَ|He|48|55|298$ٱلْغَفُورُ|(is) the Oft-Forgiving,|166|348|8348$ٱلرَّحِيمُ|the Most Merciful."|145|327|398$

1696.verse: وَرَفَعَ|And he raised|110|117|2251$أَبَوَيْهِ|his parents|93|106|9271$عَلَى|upon|63|76|52$ٱلْعَرْشِ|the throne|90|103|6451$وَخَرُّواْ|and they fell down|143|156|9273$لَهُۥ|to him|61|74|977$سُجَّدًا‌ۖ|prostrate.|86|93|550$وَقَالَ|And he said,|102|110|1089$يَـٰٓأَبَتِ|"O my father!|109|124|8800$هَـٰذَا|This|59|74|248$تَأْوِيلُ|(is the) interpretation|164|179|9274$رُءْيَـٰىَ|(of) my dream,|119|134|9033$مِن قَبْلُ|(of) before.|97|104|250$قَدْ|Verily,|61|70|1097$جَعَلَهَا|has made it|97|115|9275$رَبِّى|my Lord|72|90|2902$حَقًّا‌ۖ|true.|52|70|1566$وَقَدْ|And indeed,|98|116|2117$أَحْسَنَ|He was good|105|123|6192$بِىٓ|to me|58|76|5353$إِذْ|when|55|64|1198$أَخْرَجَنِى|He took me out|122|134|9276$مِنَ|of|50|73|156$ٱلسِّجْنِ|the prison,|91|114|9000$وَجَآءَ|and brought|100|123|7815$بِكُم|you|52|75|2564$مِّنَ|from|50|73|156$ٱلْبَدْوِ|the bedouin life|122|134|9277$مِنۢ بَعْدِ|after|91|102|280$أَن|[that]|60|83|655$نَّزَغَ|had caused discord|148|171|9278$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ|the Shaitaan|105|128|379$بَيْنِى|between me|101|124|5473$وَبَيْنَ|and between|106|117|4873$إِخْوَتِىٓ‌ۚ|my brothers.|104|113|9279$إِنَّ|Indeed,|70|88|58$رَبِّى|my Lord|72|90|2902$لَطِيفٌ|(is) Most Subtle|126|144|9280$لِّمَا|to what|72|90|426$يَشَآءُ‌ۚ|He wills.|74|92|867$إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, He,|97|106|396$هُوَ|He|48|139|298$ٱلْعَلِيمُ|(is) the All-Knower,|149|330|342$ٱلْحَكِيمُ|the All-Wise.|105|196|343$

1697.verse: ۞ رَبِّ|My Lord,|103|115|7$قَدْ|indeed,|68|92|1097$ءَاتَيْتَنِى|you have given me|145|169|9281$مِنَ|of|50|74|156$ٱلْمُلْكِ|the sovereignty|124|148|2733$وَعَلَّمْتَنِى|and taught me|117|129|9282$مِن|of|50|60|53$تَأْوِيلِ|the interpretation|137|158|8812$ٱلْأَحَادِيثِ‌ۚ|of the events.|115|136|8813$فَاطِرَ|Creator|71|92|9283$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|(of) the heavens|132|153|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth,|116|126|352$أَنتَ|You|58|70|341$وَلِىِّۦ|(are) my Protector,|149|173|9284$فِى|in|48|72|89$ٱلدُّنْيَا|the world|82|106|818$وَٱلْأَخِرَةِ‌ۖ|and the Hereafter.|143|167|1909$تَوَفَّنِى|Cause me to die|127|139|9285$مُسْلِمًا|(as) a Muslim,|113|188|2984$وَأَلْحِقْنِى|and join me|100|250|9286$بِٱلصَّـٰلِحِينَ|with the righteous."|151|226|9287$

1698.verse: ذَٲلِكَ|That|64|73|28$مِنْ|(is) from|76|94|53$أَنۢبَآءِ|the news|81|100|2853$ٱلْغَيْبِ|(of) the unseen|124|142|2854$نُوحِيهِ|which We reveal|129|148|2855$إِلَيْكَ‌ۖ|to you.|68|86|45$وَمَا|And not|72|81|46$كُنتَ|you were|81|100|1281$لَدَيْهِمْ|with them|86|125|2856$إِذْ|when|55|94|1198$أَجْمَعُوٓاْ|they put together|139|178|9288$أَمْرَهُمْ|their plan|82|121|9289$وَهُمْ|while they|88|107|256$يَمْكُرُونَ|(were) plotting.|124|124|6004$

1699.verse: وَمَآ|And not|72|103|46$أَكْثَرُ|most|64|126|9290$ٱلنَّاسِ|(of) the mankind,|135|197|75$وَلَوْ|even though|103|165|179$حَرَصْتَ|you desire,|103|134|9291$بِمُؤْمِنِينَ|(will be) believers.|141|141|82$

1692.verse: And when the bearer of good tidings arrived, he cast it over his face, and he returned [once again] seeing. He said, "Did I not tell you that I know from Allah that which you do not know?"

1693.verse: They said, "O our father, ask for us forgiveness of our sins; indeed, we have been sinners."

1694.verse: He said, "I will ask forgiveness for you from my Lord. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."

1695.verse: And when they entered upon Joseph, he took his parents to himself and said, "Enter Egypt, Allah willing, safe [and secure]."

1696.verse: And he raised his parents upon the throne, and they bowed to him in prostration. And he said, "O my father, this is the explanation of my vision of before. My Lord has made it reality. And He was certainly good to me when He took me out of prison and brought you [here] from bedouin life after Satan had induced [estrangement] between me and my brothers. Indeed, my Lord is Subtle in what He wills. Indeed, it is He who is the Knowing, the Wise.

1697.verse: My Lord, You have given me [something] of sovereignty and taught me of the interpretation of dreams. Creator of the heavens and earth, You are my protector in this world and in the Hereafter. Cause me to die a Muslim and join me with the righteous."

1698.verse: That is from the news of the unseen which We reveal, [O Muhammad], to you. And you were not with them when they put together their plan while they conspired.

1699.verse: And most of the people, although you strive [for it], are not believers.
